title: 8/22/17 - Who do you WANT to be? (Wences Casares joins Glenn)
description:
Understanding the president's speech on Afghanistan last night ...Why are US ships ramming into things lately? ...Many people aren't happy about President's Trump Afghanistan speech ...Was too much made of the solar eclipse? ...How Glenn's dad snapped him back into reality years ago ...Bitcoin entrepreneur of Xapo.com, Wences Casares joins Glenn to explain the industry ...How much should you put into bitcoin? ...'Bitcoin will be bigger than the internet' ...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
